page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN MONIFIETH
page.content:
MONIFIETH -5% This table shows our DUNDEE -50% dads' places of work. MOVE AROUND-20% Only a few work in OILRIGS -4% Monifieth.Most work ARMY -3% in Dundee. CARNOUSTIE-2% ABERDEEN -2% Danny's story GLASGOW -2% My dad fits up UNEMPLOYED-2% kitchens all over EDINBURGH -1% the place like Hull ABROAD -1% Perth and Glasgow. FORFAR -1% He did our kitchen. BROUGHTY FERRY-1%
Allan's story My dad drives a lorry for Sunblest.He has to be there at 3 o'clock in the morning.He delivers bread and rolls to places in Fife.He sometimes goes to the Old Course Hotel in St Andrews.He goes to the canteen for his dinner and has a sleep when he comes home.
